DOC.brief_summary: The study purpose is to evaluate efficacy of stress-reducing aromatherapy and learn about how aromatherapy works.
DOC.detailed_description: The study purpose is to evaluate efficacy of stress-reducing aromatherapy and learn about how aromatherapy works by comparing participants' physiologic responses to laboratory challenge tasks with and without experiencing aromatherapy.
DOC.criteria: in good physical and cognitive health reporting moderate level of stress able to perceive aromas able to understand and follow study instructions taking medications affecting CNS function or physiologic measures (e.g. steroids or neuroleptics) reporting smell sensitivities or allergies smoking presently or in the past less than one year prior to enrollment
